assignments.description: Set Bid Not Required checkbox to TRUE. Also clear Bid Type field in case this was set as it is not needed or wanted here (given the Opp is proceeding without a Bid).
assignments.name: Set_Bid_Not_Required_Checkbox_and_Clear_Bid_Type
assignments.label: Set Bid Not Required Checkbox + Clear Bid Type

assignments.description: Pre-emptively set Bid Type var as RFP so if the user selects they do require a Bid then Bid Type is already selected and cannot be overwritten.
assignments.name: Set_Bid_Type_Var
assignments.label: Set Bid Type Var

assignments.description: Set values from screen into the recordid var.
assignments.name: Set_Record_Variables
assignments.label: Set Record Variables

assignments.description: Set RFP Submitted Date to today. This can be updated by subsequent checks/steps as required.
assignments.name: Set_RFP_Submitted_Date
assignments.label: Set RFP Submitted Date

assignments.description: Set v_RFPSubmittedDate with the chosen Date. This is used to update the record.
assignments.name: Set_RFP_Submitted_Var
assignments.label: Set RFP Submitted Var

assignments.name: Set_Stage_Sub_Stage_3_1_RFI_In_Progress
assignments.label: Set Stage/Sub Stage (3.1 RFI In Progress)

assignments.description: Update recordId var with Output of Subflow
assignments.name: Update_recordId_Var
assignments.label: Update recordId Var

decisions.description:
If the following criteria are met then the user should be given the option to enter the Bid Process (asked if they need a Bid).
Corp Type != Automotive Owner Country = UK Bid Not Required (Checkbox) = FALSE
decisions.name: Allow_Option_of_Entering_Bid_Process_Decision
decisions.label: Allow Option of Entering Bid Process?

decisions.description: Check if the Award Date is in the past. If it is then the user will be prompted to check and confirm the dates.
decisions.name: Award_Date_in_Past_Check_1
decisions.label: Award Date in Past Check 1
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Award Date not in Past - Continue

decisions.description: Another check to see if the Award Date is in the past after the user was presented the screen to review the dates.
decisions.name: Award_Date_in_Past_Check_2
decisions.label: Award Date in Past Check 2

decisions.description: Did the Subflow return that Bid Not Required = TRUE? If so then the user elected not to enter the Bid process so therefore progress the Opp as normal.
decisions.name: Bid_Not_Required_Subflow
decisions.label: Bid Process Entered?

decisions.description: 3.2 RFI Submitted - this is where the RFI has been submitted and the outcome recorded. In other words the RFI has been COMPLETED.
decisions.name: Current_Sub_Stage
decisions.label: Current Sub-Stage

decisions.description: Establish Forecast Category selected to determine which Forecast Comments field from the Screen should be used.
decisions.name: Forecast_Category_Decision_3_4_Solution_Submitted
decisions.label: Forecast Category

decisions.description: Check if the Forecast fields on the move from 3.4 Solution Submitted to 4. Post Submission screen were populated. Only if they were then set the values.
decisions.name: Forecast_Fields_Populated_3_4_Solution_Submitted_Decision
decisions.label: Forecast Fields Populated? (3.4 Solution Submitted)

decisions.description: Check if the Forecast fields on the Submit Solution screen were populated. Only if they were then set the values.
decisions.name: Forecast_Fields_Populated_Submit_Solution_Decision
decisions.label: Forecast Fields Populated? (Submit Solution)

decisions.name: Process_Start_Date_Before_RFP_Submitted_Date
decisions.label: Process Start Date Before RFP Submitted Date?

decisions.description: If the Process Start Date is not yet completed then prompt users to fill it in.
decisions.name: Process_Start_Date_filled
decisions.label: Process Start Date filled?

decisions.description: If at 2.2 Needs Analysis then progress to 2.3 Pursuing. Only progress to
decisions.name: Sub_Stage_Decision
decisions.label: Sub Stage

decisions.description:
Did the user select 3.1 RFI In Progress or 3.3 Develop Solution?
Not all users are given option to enter into 3.1 RFI In Progress so default outcome is 3.3 Develop Solution.
decisions.name: Sub_Stage_Selection_Decision
decisions.label: Sub Stage Selection Decision

Flow.description: E2E-23 - Enable creation of a Bid record from a screenflow With data fix - inc APAC bid start and award Forecast Category & Forecast Comments

formulas.description:
Formula to return the earlier of the RFI/RFP Submitted Date values. Used in the input validation error for Process Start Date.
Considers if both the RFI and RFP Submitted fields are completed or not. Returns the earliest date accordingly.
formulas.name: f_Earliest_RFIRFP_Submitted_Date

formulas.description:
Formula to return TRUE or FALSE that controls whether the Allow RFI Toggle is visible (True) on the Progress to Solution Screen or not (False).
This approach taken because just using screen component conditional visibility for the Display Text components was not working without something other than the toggle to reference when the toggle is not showing.
Formula should return TRUE (and toggle should be shown) when Owner Country != UK and Sub Stage != 3.2 RFI Submitted. Excluding RFI Submitted ensures the user doesn't repeat the RFI process if they're already in it.
formulas.name: f_Show_Allow_RFI_Toggle

Flow.label: Opportunity: Progress Opportunity : Screen Flow

fields.name: AwardDateCheckScreen_DT1
fields.fieldText: This Opportunity's Award Date has passed. Please check and confirm the dates are correct before you continue.

validationRule.errorMessage: Contract Start Date must be after the Award Date
Contract End Date must be on or after {!User_Contract_Start_Date}

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred while attempting to Progress this Opportunity.


Please review the Error Message below. If the error relates to something you can resolve yourself, such as a misaligned date, then please do so and try again.


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}


If you are not able to resolve the issue yourself then please raise a ServiceNow ticket (including a screenshot and a link to the Opportunity)

fields.name: ProcessStartDate_DT
fields.fieldText:
You have not yet set a Process Start Date for this record.


Please set the date you actively started pursuing this Opportunity

validationRule.errorMessage: Process Start Date must be before RFI/RFP Submitted Date ({!f_Earliest_RFIRFP_Submitted_Date})

fields.name: Progress_to_Pursuing_DT
fields.fieldText:
Progress Opportunity


Are you sure you want to progress this Opportunity?


Current Sub Stage: {!recordId.Sub_Stage__c}

New Sub Stage: 2.3 Pursuing

fields.name: Solution_Submitted_Screen_DT
fields.fieldText:
Submit Solution


Are you sure you want to progress this Opportunity?


Current Sub Stage: {!recordId.Sub_Stage__c}

New Sub Stage: 3.4 Solution Submitted

fields.name: SubmittedDate_DT1
fields.fieldText:
Since the Award Date is in the past please select the date that the Solution was Submitted.


Award Date: {!recordId.CloseDate}

validationRule.errorMessage: RFP Submitted Date must be before Award Date

screens.description: If Process Start Date is not before the RFP Submitted Date then ask user to update date.
screens.name: Update_Process_Start_Date
screens.label: Update Process Start Date

fields.name: Process_StartDate_Update_DT
fields.fieldText:
The Process Start Date is after the Submitted Date. Please update the Process Start Date to the date you started working on the Opportunity.


This cannot be after the RFI/RFP Submitted Date ({!f_Earliest_RFIRFP_Submitted_Date})

validationRule.errorMessage: Process Start Date must be before RFI/RFP Submitted Date ({!f_Earliest_RFIRFP_Submitted_Date})

screens.description:
Screen prompting the user to continue to 3. Solution.
If the Owner Region = APAC and RFI has not previously been completed then optionally allow the user to enter Sub Stage 3.1 RFI In Progress.
Otherwise all Opportunities progress to 3.3 Develop Solution
screens.name: Update_to_Solution_Screen
screens.label: Progress to Solution (3.1 RFI In Progress or 3.3 Develop Solution)

fields.name: Progress_to_Solution_Header_DT
fields.fieldText:
Progress to Solution


Are you sure you want to progress this Opportunity?

value.stringValue: Does this deal require an RFI?

fields.name: Progress_to_Solution_3_3_Develop_Solution_DT
fields.fieldText:
Current Sub Stage: {!recordId.Sub_Stage__c}

New Sub Stage: 3.3 Develop Solution

fields.name: Progress_to_Solution_3_1_RFI_In_Progress_DT
fields.fieldText:
Current Sub Stage: {!recordId.Sub_Stage__c}

New Sub Stage: 3.1 RFI In Progress
